desc: Multiplies Item drop rate by 1.5 after Raid Quest is cleared when activated from map
lore: A precious yellow box found recently within the Vortex. This box made of special materials contains a magical light from another world that when unleashed in battle raises the probability of obtaining rare and valuable items. The reason why demons want to make use of it remains unclear, but it has been confirmed that its magic envelops Summoners in a warm light.
name: Fortune Box
